# nios_dtc_record_a (Resource)

Manages a DTC Record A.

## Example Usage

```terraform
// Create a DTC Server (Required as parent)
resource "nios_dtc_server" "create_dtc_server" {
  name = "example-server"
  host = "2.3.3.4"
}

// Create a DTC Record A with basic fields
resource "nios_dtc_record_a" "record_a_basic_fields" {
  dtc_server = nios_dtc_server.create_dtc_server.name
  ipv4addr   = "2.2.2.2"
}

// Create a DTC Record A with additional fields
resource "nios_dtc_record_a" "record_a_additional_fields" {
  dtc_server = nios_dtc_server.create_dtc_server.name
  ipv4addr   = "2.2.2.3"
  comment    = "Creating DTC Record A"
  disable    = false
  ttl        = 20
  use_ttl    = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `dtc_server` (String) The name of the DTC Server object with which the DTC record is associated.
- `ipv4addr` (String) The IPv4 Address of the domain name.

### Optional

- `comment` (String) Comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.
- `disable` (Boolean) Determines if the record is disabled or not. False means that the record is enabled.
- `ttl` (Number) The Time to Live (TTL) value.
- `use_ttl` (Boolean) Use flag for: ttl

### Read-Only

- `auto_created` (Boolean) Flag that indicates whether this record was automatically created by NIOS.
- `ref` (String) The reference to the object.
